titleStmt.title: St. Georges Day sacred to the coronation of his most excellent Majesty Charles the II. By the grace of God King of England, Scotland, France and Ireland, defender of the faith, &c. / By Hen. Bold olim è N.C. Oxon.
titleStmt.author: Bold, Henry, 1627-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for R. Crofts at the Crown in Chancery-lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
